overview: Too often, if a child is illiterate at the end of 3rd grade they will fall behind forever. By 9-years-old many children are already SENTENCED to the cycles of poverty, prison, and addiction that have devastated generations before them. Our story begins with a heartbreaking look at adults who never learned to read and ends with the children who still have a chance.
tagline: Children who don't learn to read are sentenced to a lifetime of struggle.
title: SENTENCED
